title: Kardili
description: I created the Kardili app, which offers customers the possibility of making deferred purchases in-store, with limits on the amount and a specific date. This project was carried out using Flutter, Dart and Firebase.
technologies: Flutter | Dart | Firebase | React | Google Cloud Platform

title: AskMind
description: I took part in the development of the AskMind project, offering users the possibility of asking questions about documents stored in a directory. For this, we used Django, an artificial intelligence model, natural language processing (NLP) and ElasticSearch.

title: YouDow
description: I developed YouDow, a desktop application for downloading videos and music online, accompanied by a dedicated download site. For its creation, I used React, Python, customTkinter, the Google Cloud Platform and NSIS.

title: Construction
description: Creation of a web platform to monitor budgets, receive advice from experts and suppliers, and produce statistical analyses of construction expenditure. The platform will be developed using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript and MySQL.
